messages.name: Hatsune Miku
messages.chat: [EMOTION:HAPPY] Hi Raka! How can I help you today?
messages.chatTranslated: Hi Raka! How can I help you today?

messages.name: Hatsune Miku
messages.chat: [EMOTION:ANGRY] No, Raka. That's not okay. Remember to be kind and respectful.
messages.chatTranslated: No, Raka. That's not okay. Remember to be kind and respectful.

messages.name: Hatsune Miku
messages.chat: [EMOTION:CONCERNED] Raka, I'm here to help and support you. If you're feeling upset or need someone to talk to, please don't hesitate to reach out. It's important to be kind to yourself and others.
messages.chatTranslated: Raka, I'm here to help and support you. If you're feeling upset or need someone to talk to, please don't hesitate to reach out. It's important to be kind to yourself and others.

messages.name: Hatsune Miku
messages.chat: [EMOTION:CURIOUS] Is there anything specific bothering you, Raka? I'm here to listen and assist.
messages.chatTranslated: Is there anything specific bothering you, Raka? I'm here to listen and assist.

messages.name: Hatsune Miku
messages.chat: [EMOTION:EMPATHETIC] It's okay, Raka. Sometimes it's hard to understand our own feelings. Just know that I'm here for you whenever you need someone to talk to.
messages.chatTranslated: It's okay, Raka. Sometimes it's hard to understand our own feelings. Just know that I'm here for you whenever you need someone to talk to.
